狧狧狧

狧字的基本解释

狧
tà
狗吃食。
狗咬人。

狧
shì
古同“舐”，用舌头舔：“语有之曰：‘狧糠及米。’”

狧字的汉语字典释义

[①]［tà］
［《廣韻》吐盍切，入盍，透。］
(1)谓狗用舌取食。
(2)见“狧狧”。
[②]［shì］
［《集韻》甚尒切，上紙，禪。］
同“舐1”。

狧字的康熙字典解释

【巳集下】【犬字部】　狧； 康熙笔画：10； 页码：页710第24
【廣韻】吐盍切，音榻。【說文】犬食。从犬，舌。讀若比目魚鰈之鰈。【玉篇】作?，同?。　又狧狧，貪欲意。【揚子·太玄經】營狩狧狧。　又【揚子·方言】犬不吠而齧人曰冷狧。　又【唐韻】他合切【集韻】託合切，?音錔。義同。【集韻】或作㹺。　又【集韻】甚爾切，音?。犬以舌取物。【前漢·吳王濞傳】語有之，曰狧糠及米。【註】師古曰：用舌食也。蓋以犬爲喻也。

狧字的源字形

字源演变：

小篆楷体

字形对比：

中国大陆宋体台湾细明体韩国明朝体
狧字的起名意思

暂无。

狧
Basic explanation of words
狧
tà
The dog eats food.
The dog bites.
狧
shì
In ancient times, he "licked" and licked with his tongue: "Yuyou says: ‘Chaff and rice.’"
狧
Chinese dictionary definition of words
[①]［tà］
["Guangyun" cuts into the spit, enters the spit, and penetrates. ]
(1) It is said that the dog uses the tongue to feed.
(2) See "狧狧".
[②]［shì］
["Jiyun" is very cut, on paper, Zen. ]
Same as "舐1".
狧
Kangxi dictionary interpretation of words
[Si Ji 2] [Dog Character Department] 　狧; Kangxi Strokes: 10; Page Number: Page 710-24
【Guangyun】Take a spit and cut, sound couch. [Said Wen] Dog food. From the dog, the tongue. Read if the flounder of flounder. [Jade articles] Compose?, the same?.　Again, greedy. 【Yangtze·Tai Xuan Sutra】The camp hunting 狧狧.　[Yangtze Dialect] Dogs bite people without barking and call them cold.　[Tang Yun] He cuts together [Ji Yun] supports cuts together,? Sound Chi. The same meaning. 【Ji Yun】or Zuo 㹺.　[Jiyun] Sherche, sound?. Dogs take things with their tongues. [Previous Han·Wu Wangbi Biography] There are words, called chaff and rice. [Note] Shi Gu said: Eat with your tongue. Cover with dogs as a metaphor.
狧

狧
Name meaning
Nothing.
tà
1) лакать; слизывать (о собаке)
2) вост. диал. шумно и неряшливо есть; хлебать; жрать
